changeSet.sql:
CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW readable.network_inferrence AS SELECT c.id, r1.name AS premise1, r2.name AS premise2, r3.name AS inferrence, c.notes, res.name AS research, up.name AS updated_by, c.update_date FROM ruleform.network_inferrence c JOIN ruleform.relationship r1 ON c.premise1 = r1.id JOIN ruleform.relationship r2 ON c.premise2 = r2.id JOIN ruleform.relationship r3 ON c.inferrence = r3.id LEFT JOIN ruleform.research res ON c.research = res.id JOIN ruleform.resource up ON c.updated_by = up.id;
ALTER TABLE readable.network_inferrence OWNER TO core;
